item.title: Climbing to the top of the testing pyramid with Playwright
item.description: In this workshop, you’ll learn the benefits and drawbacks of integration testing using Playwright, Microsoft’s framework and library for automated testing of web APIs and web applications. Playwright shines for testing complex flows that are impractival to cover through unit tests. This is a practical workshop, so bring a laptop with Node and your favorite code editor. Prerequisites Laptop capable of running node/npm and any code editor
